lines.text: Hand me that mirror, you incompetent bimbo!
Who are you?
Why I'm Miss Century. The World's only 100 year old stripper.
You're nothing like I expected
Oh, and who did you expect? Hmm? Suzie Homemaker?
Pay me, or I'll cut it off!
What do you do for fun?
Fun? Well, i work on cars all day and read magazines about women on motorcycles, and collect furniture that belonged to people who died.
Whip out that dip-stick and make my engine purr
Left foot, yellow!
[Samantha grabs Anvil]
You heard her! Middle leg, G-spot

[seductively]
I like to take the panel to the metal.
You should know better than to park your car without using the CLUB!
[hits Miss Devonshire across the head with the club]
Sounds of bottles crashing is music to my ears!
I feel the same way when I hear a construction worker's drill.
Slash, got any cool tattoos?
None that I can show you in public.
I've got five dollars.
Five dollars? You couldn't get in my purse, for five dollars.
Help me, I've fallen and I can't get up.
